title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.49 - Emergency control devices to be conspicuously marked
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.49 - Emergency control devices to be conspicuously marked

State Regulations

The emergency operating devices shall be
conspicuously marked with two-inch letters on contrasting background reading
"EMERGENCY SHUT OFF" with other appropriate operating instructions as required
such as push-pull-operating arrows, etc. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.49

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
